DOC.brief_title: The Ratio Hypnotic Analgesic Potency Volatile Anesthetics
DOC.detailed_description: Anesthetic agent vary relative hypnotic potency . Recent study demonstrate equi-minimum alveolar concentration various volatile anesthetic agent may produce different spectral entropy bispectral index value . However , study demonstrate difference analgesic potency volatile anesthetic . The aim clinical trial evaluate ratio hypnotic analgesic potency sevoflurane desflurane equi-minimum alveolar concentration use SPI EEG analysis .
